Unnamed: 1: Vicinity's FY22 Sustainability Report has been prepared based on the Australian financial reporting year (1 July 2021 to 30 June 2022), unless otherwise stated.
Unnamed: 11: For environmental performance data, FY16 is considered as our baseline.

Unnamed: 1:
Performance data and metrics are reported at a Vicinity Group level, unless otherwise stated. Environmental performance data and building
sustainability ratings are also presented at an asset level. Vicinity has used an operational control-based approach to report our environmental
performance data, which includes all assets under our management control. Our social data covers all retail assets under our operational control
as well as the corporate offices we occupy to run our business.
Unnamed: 11: Vicinity has obtained independent limited assurance by KPMG over some of the indicators reported within this data pack. Access our assurance\nstatement in Annexure C (page 73) and on the Sustainability Reporting page on our website.

Unnamed: 1: Where relevant, prior period figures have been restated when more accurate data becomes available or when there have been material changes to the methodologies for data calculation and estimation. \nHistorical data in our FY22 Sustainability Performance Pack has been restated to reflect asset ownership as at 30 June 2022 and includes assets divested in FY22.
Unnamed: 11: Further information about definitions, methodologies and approaches used by Vicinity to prepare its environmental; and social performance data\ncan be found in our FY22 Sustainability Reporting Criteria, available on our website.
